name: Nokia 3310 - Tic Tac Toe
description:
This game was made for the "Nokia 3310 Jam".

What more could you want! Tic Tac Toe, mixed with the Nokia 3310 colour scheme!

Controls:

W or 8 on the keypad: Move Up

A or 4 on the keypad: Move Left

D or 6 on the keypad: Move Right

X or 2 on the keypad: Move Down

S or 5 on the keypad: Enter/Submit

Controls can be changed before launching the game.
